Description: Study of a figure of a man straining, for the painting 'Israel in Egypt' in the Guildhall Art Gallery, London (acc.no 1014); standing to front with legs spread apart, leaning forward and pulling with both hands on a rope from l Blue and brown chalk
Curator's comments: The painting was exhibited at the Royal Academy in 1867 (no.434).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Edward John Poynter (L.874; Executors of)
Purchased through: Charles Francis Bell (for Executors)
